description.narrative: Programme support/ Operations,which contributes to Environmental Sustainability, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 2010-2018 - Outcome 6 / Cross-sectoral programme: National monitoring and evaluation structures provide reliable data for monitoring SDGs and other national goals and advocacy for children and women by the end of 2016

sector.narrative: Management and Operations support at CO

description.narrative: Other General Services other general services

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: UNICEF Burundi's procurement plan for 2018 was for US$22.1 million, while in practice US$22.3 million was spent on procurement. Of the procurement, 57.8 per cent or US$12.9 million was of goods and 42.6 per cent or US$9.4 million was of services. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2018
